summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General voluntary interview waiver form, used to document that an employee is voluntarily providing information as part of an investigation. The specific subject of the investigation is redacted. The form includes warnings, assurances, and signature blocks for the OIG agent and the employee/witness.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The form states the interview is voluntary, no disciplinary action will be taken for refusing to answer, and any statement may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is redacted in the text.
The form requires signatures from an OIG Special Agent and the employee/witness.
The form is dated as revision 05/03/21, indicating it is a standard administrative document.
